original_text: All who were sitting in the Sanhedrin looked intently at Stephen, and they saw that his face was like the face of an angel.
korean_text: 공회 중에 앉은 사람들이 다 스데반을 주목하여 보니 그 얼굴이 천사의 얼굴과 같더라

sentences.original_text: All who were sitting in the Sanhedrin
that his face was like the face of an angel
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 얼굴이 천사의 얼굴과 같다는 것을
